723511f-a.title: Manhattan: Thompson Street - Spring Street
723511f-a.folder: Thompson Street & Spring Street, Manhattan, NY

723368f.title: Manhattan: Spring Street - Thompson Street
723368f.text:
181-183, 185-187 Spring Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner
of Thomnson Street. The two small buildings at the corner are
frame, faced with brick on the Spring Street side.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 300.
CREUIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
723368f.folder: Spring Street & Thompson Street, Manhattan, NY

723369f-b.title: Manhattan: Spring Street - Thompson Street
723369f-b.text:
Spring Street (right), north side, east from Thompeon Street
(left) and across West Broadway (6th Ave. Elevated Line thereon).
To the left appears a amall 3 story structure, No. 88 Thompson Street,
that is constructed of wood with a metal sheath.
May 7, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
The same, from a different angle.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Apriil 25, 1939
723369f-b.folder: Spring Street & Thompson Street, Manhattan, NY

723510f-a.title: Manhattan: Thompson Street - Spring Street
723510f-a.text:
Thompeon Street, north from Spring Street, showing a clearance
at the N.W. corner upon which stood several old frame houses. This
area, populated by Italians predominately, retains a more or less
universal feature ascribed to this nationality, a local street market.
May 7, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
723510f-a.folder: Thompson Street & Spring Street, Manhattan, NY

723369f-a.title: Manhattan: Spring Street - Thompson Street
723369f-a.text:
Spring Street (right), north side, east from Thompeon Street
(left) and across West Broadway (6th Ave. Elevated Line thereon).
To the left appears a amall 3 story structure, No. 88 Thompson Street,
that is constructed of wood with a metal sheath.
May 7, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
The same, from a different angle.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Apriil 25, 1939
723369f-a.folder: Spring Street & Thompson Street, Manhattan, NY

723512f-a.title: Manhattan: Thompson Street - Spring Street
723512f-a.text:
102-04, 106 and 108 Thompson Street, east side, between Spring
and Prince Streets, showing only the lower portions of buildings
enumerated,with a street market in front of same. This area, populated
by individuals of Italian extraction find their retail necessities well
supplied by this local feature, of which this view shows only a portion.
May 7, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
723512f-a.folder: Thompson Street & Spring Street, Manhattan, NY

723508f-a.title: Manhattan: Thompson Street - Spring Street
723508f-a.text:
88 Thompson Street, an old frame house adjoining the N.E. corner of
Spring Street.
1932..
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Mudeum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 546.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
723508f-a.folder: Thompson Street & Spring Street, Manhattan, NY

723509f-b.title: Manhattan: Thompson Street - Spring Street
723509f-b.text:
(1)
Thompson Street, west side, at, adjoining, and north of the N.W.
corner of Spring Street, showing 181 Spring Street at the
corner (it has no Thompson Street house number) and 87 Thompson
Street, two doors north, both old frame houses. No. 181 Spring
Street is faced with brick.
Judging from the decorations in Thompson Street, an Italian
saint's-day festival has been going On.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, eleven years later, after the demolition of No. 87
Thompson Street, the frame house which adjoined the five-story
'garage (formerly stable).
June 7, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
723509f-b.folder: Thompson Street & Spring Street, Manhattan, NY

723370f-a.title: Manhattan: Spring Street - Thompson Street
723370f-a.text:
182 to 19b Spriug Street, south side, from Thompson Street towards
Sullivan Street. The corner building, at the left, is not cuite
all shown. The three small houses in the center are Nos. 186,
188, 190.
June 7, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
723370f-a.folder: Spring Street & Thompson Street, Manhattan, NY
